thread.title: Witness to Perth crash had to choose which victims to save | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Witness to Perth crash had to choose which victims to save | Daily Mail Online

author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Witness to Perth crash had to choose which victims to save | Daily Mail Online
text: Deadly rampage witness reveals the heartbreaking moment he chose which victims to save after man 'deliberately drove his 4WD into a woman's car' Larz Erikssen, from Perth, was the first person on the scene after crash He said he rushed past the driver and rushed to help two women he had hit Witnesses claim the 45-year-old driver was smiling and wearing aviators Footage shows him driving erratically along the Bussell Highway in Capel, WA He was thrown from his green Landcruiser and is in hospital in critical condition Driver of the Rav4, 61-year-old mother Jenni Pratt, tragically died at the scene Her passenger, 54, was airlifted to hospital in critical condition but is now stable Published: 07:44 GMT, 20 February 2017 | Updated: 11:07 GMT, 20 February 2017 161 shares
